itinerary.title: Arrival in Bangkok
itinerary.description: Welcome to the Land of Smiles! Transfer to hotel and evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Bangkok City Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Bangkok's iconic temples and royal palace.

itinerary.title: Bangkok to Phuket
itinerary.description: Fly to Phuket, the pearl of the Andaman Sea.

itinerary.title: Phi Phi Islands Day Trip
itinerary.description: Explore the stunning Phi Phi Islands by speedboat.

itinerary.title: Phuket Free Day
itinerary.description: Leisure day to explore Phuket at your own pace.

itinerary.title: Cultural Experience
itinerary.description: Experience authentic Thai culture and cuisine.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out and transfer to airport for departure.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Chiang Mai
itinerary.description: Arrive in the cultural capital of Northern Thailand.

itinerary.title: Temple Hopping Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Chiang Mai's magnificent temples.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Tokyo
itinerary.description: Welcome to Japan! Experience the bustling capital city.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bali
itinerary.description: Welcome to the Island of Gods!

itinerary.title: Arrive Delhi
itinerary.description: Welcome to India; transfer to hotel.

itinerary.title: Delhi City Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Old & New Delhi highlights.

title: Almaty Highlights Tour
inclusions: Shymbulak Mountain visit with cable car
Green Bazaar & Rakhat Chocolate Shop visit
All transfers, tourism fees and hotel taxes
exclusions: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions
GST and any increase in taxes or fuel

itinerary.title: Arrival in Almaty
itinerary.description: Arrive in Almaty, meet and greet outside the airport, transfer to hotel and enjoy a half-day city tour.

itinerary.title: Shymbulak & City Highlights
itinerary.description: Take the cable car up Shymbulak Mountain and explore Panfilov Park, Zenkov Cathedral and Kok Tobe Hill.

itinerary.title: Gorge & Bazaar Day
itinerary.description: Discover the scenic Alma Arasan Gorge and shop at the Green Bazaar and Rakhat Chocolate Shop.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast, check out of the hotel and transfer to the airport for your onward flight.
activities: Lunch at Indian restaurant (depending on flight)

title: Almaty & Issyk Lake Expedition
inclusions: Shymbulak Mountain visit with cable car
Green Bazaar & Rakhat Chocolate Shop visit
All transfers, tourism fees and hotel taxes
exclusions: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions
GST and any increase in taxes or fuel

itinerary.title: Arrival in Almaty
itinerary.description: Arrive in Almaty, meet and greet outside the airport, transfer to hotel and enjoy a half-day city tour.

itinerary.title: Mountains & City Highlights
itinerary.description: Ride the cable car up Shymbulak Mountain and explore Panfilov Park, Zenkov Cathedral and Kok Tobe Hill.

itinerary.title: Gorge & Bazaar
itinerary.description: Visit Alma Arasan Gorge then browse the Green Bazaar and Rakhat Chocolate Shop.

itinerary.title: Issyk Lake Excursion
itinerary.description: Journey to the serene Issyk Lake for a day of natural beauty and relaxation.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check out of the hotel and transfer to the airport for your flight home.
activities: Lunch at Indian restaurant (depending on flight)

title: Shanghai & Beijing Discovery
inclusions: Accommodation in Beijing (3 nights) & Shanghai (2 nights) with breakfast
Meals (Breakfasts, Indian lunches and dinners, one Chinese lunch)
Guided visits to Tiananmen Square, Forbidden City, Temple of Heaven, Great Wall at Juyongguan, jade museum and tea house
Shanghai sightseeing including Yu Garden, Jade Buddha Temple, Bund, Tianzifang & Xintiandi
All transfers by air‑conditioned coach and tourism taxes
exclusions: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions
GST and any increase in taxes or fuel

itinerary.title: Arrival in Beijing
itinerary.description: Arrive in Beijing, clear immigration and transfer to the hotel; enjoy lunch and dinner at Indian restaurants.

itinerary.title: Beijing City Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City and the Temple of Heaven.

itinerary.title: Great Wall & City Sights
itinerary.description: Visit the jade museum and travel to the Great Wall at Juyongguan. Stop for a photo at the Bird's Nest stadium and enjoy a tea ceremony.
activities: Bird's Nest photo stop & tea ceremony

itinerary.title: Beijing to Shanghai
itinerary.description: Catch the bullet train to Shanghai and explore the lively districts of Tianzifang and Xintiandi.
activities: Check out & transfer to train station

itinerary.title: Shanghai Highlights
itinerary.description: Visit Yu Garden, the Jade Buddha Temple and walk along the historic Bund; enjoy free time for shopping on Nanjing Road.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out of the hotel, enjoy some free shopping and transfer to the airport for departure.
activities: Lunch at Indian restaurant (depending on flight)

title: Japan Golden Route: Tokyo, Osaka & Kyoto
highlights: Tokyo city tour (Sumo practice, Imperial Palace East Gardens, Odaiba Park, Meiji Shrine)
Osaka Castle Park & Umeda Sky Building
Kyoto temples (Fushimi Inari Shrine, Kinkakuji Temple)
inclusions: Accommodation in Tokyo (3 nights) & Kyoto (3 nights) with breakfast
Full‑day Tokyo city tour including Sumo practice, Imperial Palace East Gardens, Odaiba Park & Meiji Shrine
Full‑day excursion to Mt. Fuji, Lake Kawaguchiko, Ninja Village & Gotemba Premium Outlets
Bullet train from Tokyo to Osaka
Osaka sightseeing including Osaka Castle Park, Umeda Sky Building & Aerial Garden Observatory
Kyoto sightseeing including Fushimi Inari Shrine, Fushimi Sake District, Kinkakuji Temple & Higashiyama District
Half‑day Osaka city tour & Dotonbori visit
All transfers by AC coach and tourism taxes
exclusions: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions
GST and any increase in taxes or fuel

itinerary.title: Arrival in Tokyo
itinerary.description: Arrive in Tokyo, clear immigration and transfer to the hotel; enjoy lunch and dinner at Indian restaurants.

itinerary.title: Tokyo City Tour
itinerary.description: Immerse yourself in a full‑day Tokyo city tour including a sumo practice viewing, the Imperial Palace East Gardens, Odaiba seaside park and Meiji Shrine.

itinerary.title: Mount Fuji & Lake Kawaguchiko
itinerary.description: Discover Mount Fuji and Lake Kawaguchiko, explore the Ninja Village and shop at Gotemba Premium Outlets.

itinerary.title: Tokyo to Osaka & Kyoto
itinerary.description: Travel by bullet train to Osaka, visit Osaka Castle Park, the Umeda Sky Building and then transfer to Kyoto.
activities: Check out & bullet train to Osaka

itinerary.title: Kyoto Cultural Highlights
itinerary.description: Enjoy a full‑day tour of Kyoto visiting Fushimi Inari Shrine, the Fushimi Sake District, Kinkakuji Temple and Higashiyama District.

itinerary.title: Osaka & Dotonbori
itinerary.description: Take a half‑day tour of Osaka and experience the vibrant Dotonbori district before returning to Kyoto.

itinerary.title: Departure from Osaka
itinerary.description: Check out of your hotel and transfer to Osaka airport for your flight home.

title: Kuala Lumpur & Genting Highlights
highlights: Kuala Lumpur city tour & KL Tower
inclusions: 3-night accommodation in Kuala Lumpur with breakfast
Half‑day Kuala Lumpur city tour with KL Tower observation deck entry
Genting Highlands tour with round‑trip cable car ride (excludes theme park entry)
Full‑day Sunway Lagoon tour with six park entrance
Visits to Thean Hou Temple and other Kuala Lumpur highlights
exclusions: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions
GST and any increase in taxes or fuel

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kuala Lumpur
itinerary.description: Arrive in Kuala Lumpur, check in to your hotel and enjoy a half‑day city tour including KL Tower.

itinerary.title: Genting Highlands Excursion
itinerary.description: Ride the cable car to Genting Highlands and enjoy free time at the hill resort.
activities: Genting Highlands tour with cable car

itinerary.title: Sunway Lagoon Adventure
itinerary.description: Spend a day of fun at Sunway Lagoon's six themed parks and visit Thean Hou Temple.
activities: Sunway Lagoon Theme Park day pass

itinerary.title: Shopping & Departure
itinerary.description: Check out of your hotel, enjoy some shopping time and transfer to the airport for your flight home.

title: Manila Cultural & Nature Tour
highlights: Manila city tour (Intramuros, Roxas Boulevard, Binondo Chinatown)
inclusions: Return economy airfare and visa on arrival
Pagsanjan Falls boat trip and countryside trolley ride
Old Meets New Manila city tour including Intramuros, Fort Santiago, Binondo Chinatown and Chinese Cemetery
exclusions: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions
GST and any increase in taxes or fuel

itinerary.title: Arrival in Manila
itinerary.description: Arrive in Manila, transfer to your hotel, relax at leisure and enjoy dinner.

itinerary.title: Pagsanjan Falls & Event Night
itinerary.description: Experience the thrill of a canoe ride to Pagsanjan Falls followed by a countryside trolley ride; enjoy an evening event show and gala dinner.

itinerary.title: Manila City Tour
itinerary.description: Discover the highlights of Manila, from scenic Roxas Boulevard to historic Intramuros and the bustling streets of Binondo Chinatown; end the day with shopping opportunities.
activities: Intramuros walking tour including Fort Santiago
Shopping in Manila (Greenbelt, Mall of Asia etc.)

itinerary.title: Angeles City Excursion
itinerary.description: Visit Angeles City to explore its vibrant nightlife and historical landmarks before returning to Manila.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out of your hotel, enjoy a final meal and transfer to the airport for your flight home.

title: Seoul & Busan Explorer
highlights: DMZ tour (Imjingak Park, Third Infiltration Tunnel, Dora Observatory)
Seoul city tour (Gyeongbokgung Palace & Bukchon Hanok Village)
Busan: Haedong Yonggungsa Temple & Haeundae Sky Capsule
Gamcheon Cultural Village & Songdo Sea Air Cruise
N-Seoul Tower, Gangnam Square, Starfield Library & Nanta Show
Bullet train between Seoul and Busan
inclusions: Accommodation in Seoul (4 nights) & Busan (2 nights) with breakfast
All meals (Breakfast, Indian/International lunches, Indian dinners)
Half‑day DMZ tour including Imjingak Park, Third Infiltration Tunnel & Dora Observatory
Seoul city sightseeing including Gyeongbokgung Palace & Bukchon Hanok Village
Nami Island day trip with local lunch
Busan sightseeing including Haedong Yonggungsa Temple, Haeundae Sky Capsule & Haeundae Beach
Full‑day Busan attractions tour: Gamcheon Cultural Village, Songdo Sea Air Cruise & BIFF Square
KTX bullet train tickets between Seoul and Busan
Seoul sightseeing including N-Seoul Tower with cable car, Gangnam Square, Starfield Library, Coex Mall & Nanta Show
All transfers by AC coach, tourism and hotel taxes
exclusions: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions
GST and any increase in taxes or fuel

itinerary.title: Arrival in Seoul
itinerary.description: Arrive in Seoul, transfer to your hotel and enjoy a Han River cruise in the evening.

itinerary.title: DMZ & Seoul City Tour
itinerary.description: Take a half‑day excursion to the DMZ and then visit Gyeongbokgung Palace and Bukchon Hanok Village.
activities: DMZ tour: Imjingak Park, Third Infiltration Tunnel, Dora Observatory
Lunch at Indian or international buffet restaurant

itinerary.title: Nami Island Excursion
itinerary.description: Travel to Nami Island to stroll through its tree‑lined paths and enjoy a local lunch before returning to Seoul.

itinerary.title: Seoul to Busan
itinerary.description: Board the KTX bullet train to Busan and enjoy a half‑day city tour including Haedong Yonggungsa Temple, Haeundae Sky Capsule ride and Haeundae Beach.
activities: Check out & transfer to train station

itinerary.title: Busan Highlights
itinerary.description: Explore Gamcheon Cultural Village, ride the Songdo Sea Air Cruise and wander around BIFF Square.

itinerary.title: Return to Seoul & K‑Culture Experience
itinerary.description: Return to Seoul by bullet train and enjoy a full‑day tour featuring N‑Seoul Tower with cable car, Gangnam Square, Starfield Library, Coex Mall and the Nanta Show.
activities: Check out & transfer to train station

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out of your hotel and transfer to Incheon Airport for your flight home.

title: Ho Chi Minh City & Mekong Delta
highlights: Saigon city tour (Reunification Palace, War Remnants Museum, Notre Dame Cathedral, Jade Emperor Pagoda)
inclusions: 3‑night accommodation in Ho Chi Minh City with breakfast
Two water bottles (500 ml) per person per day
Half‑day city tour of Saigon including Reunification Palace, War Remnants Museum, Notre Dame Cathedral, Jade Emperor Pagoda
Mekong Delta excursion to My Tho with sampan cruise around Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix and Tortoise islands
exclusions: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions
GST and any increase in taxes or fuel

itinerary.title: Arrival in Ho Chi Minh City
itinerary.description: Arrive in Saigon, check in to your hotel and set out for a half‑day city tour.
activities: Half‑day city tour (Reunification Palace, War Remnants Museum, Notre Dame Cathedral, Old Post Office, Jade Emperor Pagoda)
itinerary.accommodation: 4‑star hotel in Ho Chi Minh City

itinerary.title: Cu Chi Tunnels
itinerary.description: Explore the historic Cu Chi Tunnels and enjoy a gala dinner in the evening.

itinerary.title: Mekong Delta Experience
itinerary.description: Visit My Tho and cruise through the Mekong Delta's beautiful islands; return to Saigon in the evening.
activities: Sampan cruise around Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix & Tortoise islands

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Enjoy breakfast, check out and transfer to the airport for your flight home.

title: Vietnam Highlights: Saigon & Hanoi
highlights: Saigon city tour (Reunification Palace, War Remnants Museum, Notre Dame Cathedral, Jade Emperor Pagoda)
Mekong Delta excursion with cycling at Tan Thach village
Hanoi city tour (Tran Quoc Temple, St Joseph Cathedral, Hoan Kiem Lake, Train Street)
Ha Long Bay cruise with Sung Sot Cave, Luon Cave & Ti Top Island
inclusions: Accommodation in Saigon (2 nights) & Hanoi (2 nights) with breakfast
Half‑day Saigon city tour and Cu Chi Tunnels tour
Mekong Delta excursion to My Tho with sampan cruise and cycling in Tan Thach village
Domestic flight from Saigon to Hanoi
Half‑day Hanoi city tour including Tran Quoc Temple, St Joseph Cathedral, Hoan Kiem Lake & Train Street
Thang Long Water Puppet Show tickets
Full‑day Ha Long Bay premium cruise including kayaking/bamboo boat, Sung Sot Cave & Ti Top Island
exclusions: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions
GST and any increase in taxes or fuel

itinerary.title: Arrive in Saigon
itinerary.description: Arrive in Ho Chi Minh City, check in to your hotel and enjoy a combined city tour and Cu Chi Tunnels visit.
activities: Half‑day city tour (Reunification Palace, War Remnants Museum, Notre Dame Cathedral, Old Post Office, Jade Emperor Pagoda)

itinerary.title: Mekong Delta & Gala Dinner
itinerary.description: Cruise through the Mekong Delta from My Tho, cycle around Tan Thach village and enjoy a gala dinner in the evening.
activities: Sampan cruise around Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix & Tortoise islands
Gala dinner with DJ, soft drinks, wine & cocktails

itinerary.title: Saigon to Hanoi
itinerary.description: Fly to Hanoi and explore the city's highlights including Tran Quoc Temple, St Joseph Cathedral, Hoan Kiem Lake and Train Street; conclude with a Water Puppet Show.
activities: Hanoi city tour: Tran Quoc Temple, St Joseph Cathedral, Hoan Kiem Lake & coffee at Train Street

itinerary.title: Ha Long Bay Cruise
itinerary.description: Embark on a full‑day premium cruise on Ha Long Bay, visiting Sung Sot Cave and Luon Cave and relaxing on Ti Top Island.
activities: Cruise past Fighting Chicken & Incense Burner Islets
Kayak or bamboo boat through Luon Cave
Swim or hike on Ti Top Island
Return to harbor & transfer to hotel

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out of your hotel, enjoy some shopping time and transfer to the airport for your flight home.
